crackedUsername.description: Set this field to the username you want

allowCrackedAccounts.description: Allows you to use cracked/offline Minecraft accounts on Lunar Client (remove all premium accounts to use)

capeSystem.description: Allows you to change the cape/cosmetics system that the client will use

autoGGCommand.description: The command that will be executed instead of the default "/achat gg"

cpsText.description: The text that the CPS counter will say (instead of CPS)

fpsText.description: The text that the FPS counter will say (instead of FPS)

levelHeadText.description: The text that will show up under someones username (instead of Level)

nickhiderText.description: The username that will show up if you enable self-nicking. Particularly useful if you want a custom name with symbols and colors

reachText.description: The text that will show up in the Reach mod (instead of "blocks")

changeModStrings.description: Allows you to change texts shown by certain mods

clothCapes.description: Replaces all Lunar cloaks with a cloth cloak texture (might slow down your game)

afkText.description: Text that will show up if the game screen is currently not active

clientID.description: If you don't know what this is, do not touch

displayActivity.description: If enabled, your current activity (singleplayer/multiplayer/menu/afk) will be shown in Discord

icon.description: Allows you to set the icon ID (leave this as "logo" for the ST logo

iconText.description: Changes the hover text for the icon

menuText.description: Text that will show up if some kind of menu is opened

showIcon.description: If enabled, an icon will be shown

showServerIP.description: If enabled, the address of the server you are on is show in Discord. Be careful with private SMPs!

singlePlayerText.description: Text that will show up if you are not playing on a server

discordRichPresence.description: Allows you to change the look-and-feel of the Discord Rich Presence

multiplier.description: Specifies the number to multiply the fps value with

fpsSpoof.description: Allows you to increase the number your FPS counter says by multiplying by a constant

multiplier.description: The amount of camera shake that you want. Set to 0 if you want to remove camera shake

hurtCamShake.description: Changes how much the camera shakes when taking damage

lunarOverlays.description: Allows you to use so-called "Lunar Client overlays"

removeBlogPosts.description: Removes advertisements of Lunar on the home screen of the client

removeClientSettings.description: Similar as Remove Mod Settings, except more general. Usually has no effect (but it might in the future)

removeModSettings.description: Prevents Lunar Client from forcing mod settings

removePinnedServers.description: Removes the advertised servers on the Multiplayer screen

removeServerIntegration.description: Prevents Lunar from setting mod settings based on the server you are on (for example, this removes the Freelook ban)

metadata.description: Allows you to remove certain unwanted features from Lunar Client

privacy.description: Prevents Lunar Client from spying on your computer

removeFakeLevelHead.description: On Hypixel, nicked players will no longer get assigned a random level

removeMousePopup.description: Removes the annoying popup about your mouse polling rate

removeProfilesCap.description: Removes the maximum profiles count of 8

toggleSprintText.description: Allows you to change the text shown by the Toggle Sprint/Sneak mod

url.description: Paste the websocket URL you want to use here

websocketURL.description: Allows you to modify the websocket URL that the client uses to fetch resources

showVersion.description: Determines if the Engine version is displayed in the window title

title.description: The new title that will show up

windowTitle.description: Allows you to set a custom title for the game's window
